title: How to Make Woman in Infinite Craft: Everything You Need to Know

steps.title: The fastest path to make Woman takes 9 combinations.
steps.content: The fastest path to make Woman takes 9 combinations. There are many ways to make Woman in Infinite Craft, but the fastest way only takes 9 combinations [1] X Research source : Water + Water = Lake Earth + Water = Plant Lake + Plant = Lily Lily + Wind = Flower Flower + Plant = Garden Garden + Lily = Eden Eden + Lily = Adam Adam + Earth = Man Adam + Man = Woman

steps.title: There are many combinations that create Woman.
steps.content: There are many combinations that create Woman. We've listed the top 10 combinations below. You can check out all of the combinations on the Infinite Craft Wiki's Woman page. Adam + Man Man + Perfume Earth + Venus of Willendorf Fire + Venus of Willendorf Dust + Venus of Willendorf Dating + Man Adam + Bone Mud + Venus of Willendorf Human + Man Love + Man

steps.title: Hundreds of recipes use the Woman element.
steps.content: Hundreds of recipes use the Woman element. To see all the recipes that require Woman, check out the Woman page on the Infinite Craft Wiki. Most of the recipes are for female people or concepts relating to femininity, but you can also use Woman to make Baby and Love. Since Woman is used in so many recipes, combine it with all of your elements once you unlock it just to see what you can create!
